Text:
Fascinating share, thank you.

Maybe someday somebody could post a torrent of all the hubble pics... I'm sure there are some interesting ones the past 20 years.

There are, but even the limited collectin I have is several gigs and it is not complete.  The NASA picture of the day site has a fairly good archive of many pictures from the past few years in good resolution and size.  http://antwrp.gsfc.nasa.gov/apod/archivepix.html
I have some other torrents with pics from hubble and spitzer and also still a nice collection of pics offline :) looking for anything in particular?
cool we've made top 100 nearly 3k downloads :D
